title.rendered: AAG Participates in the 10th FIA G.T. Championship

content.rendered:
Alutech is pleased to invite you to action-packed days during the 10th Round FIA G.T. Championship in Dubai! Be there for the qualifying rounds, dragster demos and on & off track entertainment. You can even ‘Test Your Skills’ by driving the Ferrari round the Championship Circuit!

The 10th Round FIA G.T. Championship, participated in by AAG, will be held from November 16 to 19, 2005 at the Dubai Autodrome.
